programmes.show_description: Step into the new season with ICHI. Discover stylish fashion pieces designed to refresh your wardrobe and elevate your everyday look!

Our expert guests are here to introduce you to our cutting-edge range of 'grown-up gadgets'. Whether you're into cameras, music or gaming, it's all here from the biggest names.

Start your week with a first look at some of the most exciting limited time offers at QVC across home, garden, beauty and fashion in The Big Deal Morning Show.
Get ahead with your gardening and DIY with our hottest deals.
Step into the new season with ICHI. Discover stylish fashion pieces designed to refresh your wardrobe and elevate your everyday look!
Tune in for top offers on a variety of homeware and spruce up your space for less. In this show, we'll be looking at must-have tech from Amazon so you can kit out your digital home.
Ultrasun have the answer to your summer holidays with once-a-day suncare protection. Tune in to find out which product is best for you and your family all year round.
Continuing the extravaganza celebrating the timeless beauty of Diamonds. Join us as we view at least 60 truly dazzling designs, ranging from subtle to breathtaking and classic to contemporary.
Laura Geller is a renowned make-up artist, teacher and working mother and the creative force behind one of the most successful make-up studios in New York. Join us to explore her superb range.
Step into the new season with ICHI. Discover stylish fashion pieces designed to refresh your wardrobe and elevate your everyday look!
Visit your one-stop shop for the latest handbags to keep you on style. We have a range on offer from Kipling casuals and Charlie Lapson leather classics, to on-trend pieces from Kathy Van Zeeland.
SBC have captured the essences of plants to soothe your body. Tune in to find out how your skin can benefit from their renowned natural gel formulations.
Want to know what's hot in the world of electronics? Tune in and explore the latest innovations in TVs, computers, tablets, cameras and more from the leading brands you know and trust.

Wake up to QVC! We've chosen products from across all our ranges to ensure there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tune in to see special guests too.
First established over 150 years ago, join reputable gardening brand de Jager as they share high quality plants and bulbs in all shapes and sizes, to help you create your dream outdoor space.
QVC Food Hall brings you a show packed full of delicious treats from some of your most loved food brands at QVC. Sweet or savoury, we'll have something to tempt your taste buds in this show.
Refresh your beauty collection with the award-winning formulas from SBC. From skincare to bodycare, discover moisturising gels, body washes, oils and more.
Join us as we showcase products that help people with reduced mobility enjoy an active lifestyle. From mobility scooters to sound amplifiers, our range can help people improve their quality of life.
Discover fashion from Izabel London. This inclusive brand caters to sizes 8 - 26 and features designs for the trend-conscious fashion fan shopping for everything from everyday style to holiday looks.

Discover sophistication with the Effy Jewellery Collection. Handcrafted in New York, each piece mixes stunning gemstones with 18ct gold, offering enduring beauty and elegance.
